summary: This is an email chain regarding a request to overnight security cameras for the MCC New York project, involving a Program Manager at SigNet Technologies and a Communications Technician at the US Department of Justice. It appears to be logistical planning for security equipment installation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

persons.name: Program Manager FBOP Contracts SigNet Technologies
persons.context: Sender of the email requesting to overnight cameras for the MCC New York project and discussing mock-up of a unit.

persons.name: Communications Technician US Department of Justice MCC-New York
persons.context: Recipient of the email regarding the MCC New York project camera request.

connections.person1: Program Manager FBOP Contracts SigNet Technologies

events.title: Camera Request for MCC New York

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated March 22, 2019 regarding security camera equipment for MCC New York.
A Program Manager at SigNet Technologies requested to overnight cameras to mock up a unit before installation.
The correspondence involves personnel from SigNet Technologies and the US Department of Justice at MCC New York.
The email contains standard confidentiality disclaimers about proprietary information.
The document shows logistical planning for security equipment at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
